I think it is in our interests and I would hope in their interests to do a quick analysis of concerns that have been raised by competitors. Hopefully, they are minor or they are not correct, and we'll find out and make sure we are operating well within the law and the spirit of the law, Eric Schmidt told the Telegraph.
